model.data

Class Noeud

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.data.Noeud

  • public class Noeud
extends java.lang.Object
    Noeud is a point of the city map (a street crossroad) It contains the x, y coordinates in meters
    Author:
    Vadim Caen, Maria Etegan, Anthony Faraut, Ludmila Danilescu, Marco Montalto, Bernardo Rittmeyer
